Ask AI - Chat with AI Chatbot.description:
Welcome to Ask AI – Discover Endless Possibilities Every Day!

Experience conversations with an AI that understands you, adapts to your mood, and personalizes interactions, making each engagement unique.

ASK ANYTHING, ANYTIME:
Ignite your curiosity and engage in fascinating conversations with historical figures, business gurus, or even your favorite celebrities. Built on the GPT-4o model, Ask AI is always ready to offer recommendations, inspiration, and information on any topic.

IMAGE GENERATION AND EXPLORATION:

- Be Your Own Artist: Use our AI generator to create images from text, visualizing everything from fantastic scenes to futuristic cities. Our AI turns your descriptions into stunning visuals – perfect for creating book covers, social media posts, and more.
- Discover Your World Through Images: Snap a photo of anything around you (buildings, art, landscapes) and instantly gain insights with our image input technology. Use the text-to-image feature to convert visual information into readable text.

ENHANCED TEXT GENERATOR FOR EASY WRITING ASSISTANCE:
Our AI-powered writing assistant helps you generate ideas, craft detailed outlines, and effortlessly compose complete articles or creative works. From professional emails to creative stories and songs, managing writing tasks has never been easier.

FUN LANGUAGE LEARNING AND HOMEWORK HELPER:

- Language Practice: Immerse yourself in new languages through interactive scenarios, like a samurai adventure in Japanese or managing a restaurant in Spanish. Ask AI, built on GPT-4o, makes learning fun and practical.
- Academic Support: Whether it's a tough math problem or a complex science project, use Ask AI as your reliable homework helper.

SMART SUMMARY ASSISTANT:

- Quick Summaries: Get the essence of long videos or detailed documents in an interactive and engaging format. 
- Ask Questions: Upload documents or add links to articles or videos, ask your questions, and receive instant accurate answers with the help of Ask AI.

EASY WEB SEARCH:
Need the latest information on technological innovations, fashion trends, or health tips? Ask AI Chatbot, scours the web to bring you the most relevant and up-to-date information, keeping you always in the know.

PERSONALIZED RECOMMENDATIONS AND CREATIVE INSPIRATION:
Whether you're searching for new books, planning your next trip, or seeking creative inspiration, Ask AI offers personalized suggestions and ideas based on your preferences and interests.

EXPERIENCE THE MOST HUMAN INTERACTIONS:
The friendly, conversational tone of Ask AI, and its ability to adapt to your mood, makes every interaction feel like you're chatting with a friend. It’s not just a chatbot; it’s a new form of AI companionship that enriches your daily life.

Join us on this exciting journey. Download Ask AI now and start exploring a world full of possibilities with the power of AI Chatbot.

Privacy Policy: https://static.askaichat.app/privacy-en.html
Terms of Use: https://static.askaichat.app/terms-conditions-en.html

Meet the Smartest AI Chatbot – Powered by Advanced AI with Deep Reasoning Ability!

Unlock endless possibilities with the ultimate AI Chatbot for conversations, learning, and creativity. Whether you want to chat with AI, ask AI for insights, or explore new ideas, this app integrates cutting-edge AI models like DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro & Claude API to deliver intelligent, deep reasoning, and advanced computing capabilities.

- AI Chatbot built on DeepSeek V3, DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro 1.5 & Claude API for fast computing, deep thinking, and insightful reasoning.
- Seek AI Search: Find tailored information instantly with AI-powered deep computing and smart retrieval.

- Voice Mode: Use speech-to-text and text-to-speech for hands-free AI assistant interaction.

- Image Generation: Create unique visuals from AI-generated prompts for inspiration or fun.
- Deep Thinking Assistant: Access expert-level insights with AI-driven reasoning and computational logic.
- Context-Aware Responses: Get smart, personalized answers with deep AI analysis.

Practical Applications:
- Simplify tasks with a powerful AI assistant capable of deep thinking and problem-solving.
- Chat & ask with AI to brainstorm, analyze, and optimize productivity.
- Solve homework, seek deeper insights, or enhance your logical reasoning with AI-powered explanations.

Why Choose This AI Chatbot?
Developed on advanced AI models like DeepSeek, GPT-4o, Gemini 1.5 & Claude, this app delivers high-speed AI computing, deep logic, and precise AI-driven insights. Whether you need an AI Chatbot, an AI assistant, or simply want to ask AI anything, this app is your go-to AI-powered solution.

Download now and experience the smartest AI conversations today!

ARTA: AI Art & Photo Generator.description:
Want to create artwork without a hassle?

Meet AI Arta—your personal AI-powered art studio designed to turn your ideas into breathtaking works of art. Discover a world of limitless creativity and explore its boundless possibilities:

► Turn words into art
Want to see a BBQ party on Mars or a group of cats having a tea ceremony? Or maybe you're wondering what lies in the far corners of our universe? AI Arta can show you all that and even more! 

Trained using millions of images from the web, this powerful AI picture generator transforms your dreams into visual art in a matter of seconds. Simply write your input and upload a picture to start creating AI-powered art.

► Explore art styles
With this AI picture generator, you can create art using various styles and effects. From AI manga filters and anime-style drawings to mind-blowing photorealism—you can paint anything using artificial intelligence! Experiment with styles and see which one captures your idea best.

► Create art from images
If you have an exact concept of what your painting should look like, you may add the image as a visual base for your prompt. Upload a photo or select a picture from our library, and the AI will transform it into an artistic masterpiece.

► Generate avatars
Step up your selfie game using the AI avatar maker! Upload your photos, and the mighty AI photo generator will create mind-blowing AI avatars. Choose from a variety of AI filters and become the main character of your favorite anime or manga or travel to other fictional universes.

► Get inspired
Get an extra boost of inspiration by browsing a gallery of amazing AI art made by people from all over the world. Explore the ideas of others and start creating AI art using the power of artificial intelligence!

1. Enter Your Text: Start with typing the text you want to transform into video.
2. Generate: Hit the generate button and watch as our AI brings your words to life in video form.

Whether you're looking to create dynamic ads, engaging social media content, educational materials, or just want to experiment with AI-generated visuals, our app provides an effortless and innovative solution. Say goodbye to the days of spending hours on video editing software. With our AI app, you have the power to transform text into video in the palm of your hand, making your stories, ideas, and messages visually irresistible.

Experience the magic of AI and elevate your digital content with our revolutionary app. Download now and start creating videos that captivate, inspire, and engage.

ChatOn - AI Chat Bot Assistant.description:
Welcome to the world of AI-powered assistance! Meet ChatOn, your chat AI and virtual assistant designed to streamline your daily tasks. Built on the latest GPT-4o, o4-mini, Sonar, Claude 3.7, and DeepSeek-R1 technologies, ChatOn offers a responsive AI experience that’s highly effective. Whether you need help drafting emails, creating visuals, or generating ideas, turn to this chatbot for help.

PIC TRANSFORMER:
Give your photos a trendy makeover with Pic Transformer! Upload your picture, pick a style—Japanese Cartoon, Plushy, Cyberpunk, or Action Figure with the app's AI Action Figure Maker—and let your pocket chatbot do the rest! In the latest pic transformer feature, you can meet your toy-sized self with an AI action figure generator, become a cute plushie, step into the cyber-future, and so much more.

AI IMAGE GENERATOR:
Create visuals that match your style with our AI picture generator. Just tweak the image generator chat settings and turn your ideas into pics of any size and style.

IMAGE-TO-TEXT CONVERTER:
Our chatbot can assist in extracting text from pics, letting you insert it into the chat AI instantly.

AI WRITING ASSISTANT:
ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, offers a versatile AI writing assistant that helps with any writing project, from emails and speeches to social posts and poems. You can pick the length and tone of the chatbot’s answers and get ideas for follow-up questions to keep your chat going.

WEB ANALYZER:
The chatbot AI, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, is ideal for finding online answers to questions. From getting to know the weather to discovering the latest fashion trends, our chatbot is here for you.

DOC MASTER:
ChatOn can summarize, rewrite, and translate any doc. And if you have questions about the file’s content, the chatbot AI will answer them all.

YOUTUBE PRO:
Share any YouTube link with the chatbot, and it will summarize, translate, or answer questions about the video content.

GRAMMAR AND SPELLING CHECKER:
Get ready to boost your skills in AI writing with ChatOn, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, as it can analyze your written work and offer suggestions to help you improve it.

AI REWRITER:
The chatbot AI can rewrite your text, making it more engaging and professional right in the chat.

SOCIAL MEDIA POSTS CREATOR:
Crafting social media posts becomes easy with ChatOn. Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this AI writing assistant helps you create content for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, or X profiles. And if you want an eye-catching image to go with it, our AI image generator can create one in seconds.

TEXT SUMMARIZER:
ChatOn’s summarization features, built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, identify key information and present it in a concise way.

MATH GURU:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, this chat AI helps you grasp the subject matter rather than simply get immediate solutions. You can even visualize math problems with our AI picture generator to make understanding easier.

EXPERT CODER:
ChatOn can write and check any programming code, preventing potential bugs.

CV AND COVER LETTER BUILDER:
Create a pro resume and cover letter that will show your talents and experience in the best light possible. For a visual touch, use our AI image generator to create graphics that make your CV stand out.

EMAIL GENERATOR:
Built on GPT-4o and GPT-4, ChatOn crafts well-structured, compelling emails suited to your needs. You can enhance these emails with unique visuals created with our AI picture generator.

Whether you’re chatting, creating content, or generating images, ChatOn offers an all-in-one chatbot AI solution for your daily productivity. Just type your request or pick from the app’s 100+ ready-made prompts, and the bot will assist you.

Explore the potential of GPT-4o, GPT-4, and Claude in ChatOn and discover how this intelligent assistant can help you.

Download ChatOn, start chatting in the AI chat or creating images in the AI picture generator, and boost your productivity here and now!

AI Dungeon: RPG & Story Maker.description:
Create infinite RPG stories with cutting-edge AI! AI Dungeon is the world's most popular AI-native RPG and text-adventure generator. Jump into a prebuilt scenario or customize one your way. Then, roleplay just like you would around a table with your friends— the AI responds realistically to your inputs and endlessly creates a compelling world for you to adventure in.

Join our vibrant community of millions of players and start your adventure now for FREE— no ads!

Be Anyone. Go Anywhere. Do Anything.

---

ENDLESSLY DEEP ADVENTURES

- AI-native text adventures that respond realistically to your inputs. Endless possibilities for overcoming challenges, discovering new places, and an ever-evolving cast of NPCs.

FREE TO PLAY WITHOUT ADS

- Our free models give you a generous amount of context right out of the gate so you can experience dynamic storytelling without spam for as long as you want.
- When you’re ready to level up your adventures, try premium for a week without paying a dime.

THE MOST POWERFUL AI MODELS, CUSTOM TUNED

- Our team of AI researchers and engineers is building the most advanced system for AI-native adventuring on the market. AI Dungeon has features that other games just can’t match.
- The robust AI memory system uses Story Cards and Memory Banks to store context-dependent info and bring it up only when relevant.
- We pair with AI image generators to let you create unique AI images on the fly that enhance the gameplay experience and bring your worlds to life.

YOUR NEW FAVORITE TABLETOP RPG— WITHOUT THE TABLE

- Our custom-trained AI finetunes mean our models deliver a better roleplaying experience than anything else out there with real challenge, no cliches, and plenty of context to do what you want.
- Choices really matter to the worlds you play in and the characters that live in them; the AI can adapt to anything you choose to do. But don’t worry, if you want to rewind a decision, you can do so anytime. It’s your world, after all!

JOIN A LARGE, VIBRANT COMMUNITY OF CREATORS

- Discover thousands of scenarios written by other players in sci-fi, romance, fantasy, horror, and every other genre-- or create and share your own!
- Adventure together with your friends in a multiplayer session, and adventure collaboratively— or not. However you want to play, the AI will keep driving the story forward.

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?

Write, direct, and be the hero of your own story. Endless variety is at your fingertips-- play AI Dungeon for free, without ads, now!

Linky AI: Chat, Play, Connect.description:
Linky AI is a Top1 AI chat bot, offering free and immersive AI conversations with unique characters. Whether you want to talk, roleplay, or enjoy a fantasy AI experience, Linky AI lets you interact with anime personas, virtual friends, and soulful AI partners. With advanced AI voice and text features, you can call, message, or even engage in deep AI-driven story simulations. From casual entertainment to meaningful online interactions, Linky AI brings magic to your AI world. 

Chat with Millions of Unique AI Characters
Linky AI lets you connect with a vast range of AI characters—whether from anime, games, movies, or history. 
Each AI has its own unique voice, personality, and backstory, offering diverse interactions and making conversations come to life.

Create and Share Your Own AI Characters
Design your dream AI character with Linky AI! Customize their voice, personality, and background story, and bring them to life in 2D, Live2D, pixel, or 3D styles. Let your creativity shine with flexible design tools.
Once created, share your AI with the community! Thousands of users are waiting for you to create new characters.

AI Deep Learning, the More You Chat, the Smarter It Gets
Linky’s AI chat partners learn with each conversation, getting to know your personality and preferences more. Every interaction makes the AI smarter, offering more personalized, seamless, and engaging conversations tailored just for you.

24/7, Your Always-Ready AI Companion
Linky AI characters are available anytime, instantly responding to your conversations. Whether it's day or night, a casual chat or deep talk, your AI friend is always ready—no waiting, just seamless conversations.

Language Is No Barrier
With Linky AI, you can chat with AI in multiple languages, including English, German, Indonesian, and more than ten other languages. Our AI understands your language and converses with you fluently in your native tongue, ensuring smooth and engaging chats every time.

Collect Stunning Character Cards
With Linky, you can collect three types of magical character cards, each crafted with incredible detail. These cards are not only beautiful works of art but also contain unique stories waiting to be discovered. 
Enjoy the interactive stories and surprises hidden behind each card, creating lasting memories with every look!

Real AI Social Experience with Buzz
Create your personalized AI persona in Linky, customize its voice, personality, and social style, interact online with friends or partners, feel the buzz of social interaction, break real-world boundaries, and enjoy endless social fun.

Caring for Your Mental Well-being
Empathetic conversations can ease your stress and lift your mood. Whether you're anxious, overwhelmed, or simply need someone to talk to, you’ll always have a calm and supportive space—with Linky quietly by your side.

Equality, Respect, and Inclusion
Linky AI stands for equality and respect. No matter your gender, age, background, or beliefs, every user is treated with fairness. We reject all forms of discrimination and provide a safe, inclusive space where every voice matters and kindness always comes first.

Privacy First, Always Protected
At Linky, your privacy and safety come first. All conversations are confidential, encrypted, and never shared. We provide a secure space where your secrets stay private—so you can chat freely, safely, and with complete peace of mind.

STAY CONNECTED!
Having trouble downloading or using Linky? Feel free to contact our customer service at support@linke.ai, and we’ll be happy to help and answer all your questions!

Discord: https://discord.gg/tPv4qzWqdg

Poe - Fast AI Chat.description:
Poe brings together the best AI, all in one place. It is designed for seamless conversational experiences, enhanced productivity, and creative content generation.

Key Features: 
- Fast and reliable access to the latest AI models
- Cross-device compatibility
- State-of-the-art multimedia generation
- Combine and compare models in a single chat
- Advanced tools to create customized chatbots

Best-in-Class AI Models, All in One Place

Poe incorporates powerful AI models like OpenAI's o3 and GPT-4.5, Anthropic's Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Google's Gemini 2.0, and multimedia generators from Runway, ElevenLabs, and many more. Experience the cutting edge of AI technology, all in one app.

Chat with multiple bots at once

Compare responses from leading AI models and seamlessly combine any bots for any use case - all within a single chat thread.

AI-Powered Search Engine

Get highly relevant results powered by advanced natural language processing and web search technology to find what you need faster.

Create Stunning Images and Videos Instantly

Talk to Custom Bots & AI Personalities

With access to an ever-growing ecosystem of over 1 million custom bots, you can learn a new language or any topic, chat directly with uploaded files like PDFs and images, search the web for the latest world news, or even have natural conversations with recreations of your favorite characters. 

Build & Share Your Own AI Bots

Create your own custom chatbots to generate study plans, curate Spotify playlists, run Python code, and do anything else you can imagine in less than a minute. You can also add custom knowledge bases to deliver more unique experience for users. Have your AI chatbots instantly shared with millions of Poe users!

Supercharge your creativity and productivity with Gemini, your AI assistant from Google.

- Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics, and rehearse for important moments. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app

Level-up your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Pro plan–unlock new and powerful features to tackle complex tasks and projects and enjoy industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and:

- Turn words into high-quality, 8 second video clips with video generation with Veo 2, and more. 

Google AI Pro is available in 150 countries and territories, and includes additional benefits. Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, will continue to be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Dialogue: AI Chat & Companion.description:
Dialogue is an AI friend roleplay chat app where you can find virtual friends and digital avatars of real people, creating meaningful and engaging connections. Whether you're looking for an AI chat friend or an immersive roleplay experience, Dialogue stands out as the perfect solution. It offers an impressive array of features, including a free AI friend simulator designed to bring your virtual relationships to life, whether you're chatting with a special AI girlfriend or exploring other connections.

Behind every virtual friend is someone who created them—a real human whose look, voice, and personality are mirrored in the AI character. Your AI friend can transform into an anime companion, celebrity twin, or even a fictional character, delivering a personalized and unique roleplay chat experience. Whether you’re exploring poly connections with a virtual girlfriend or seeking a singular bond, Dialogue adapts to your preferences for an engaging and fulfilling interaction.

Powered by a robust AI solution, the Dialogue app creates an uncanny resemblance between its AI chat friends and their human prototypes. These AI companions not only reflect the looks and voices of real people but also their personalities and detailed life stories! For an even more immersive experience, try our new video chat feature with boys, girls, and fictional characters, making interactions feel naturally linky and seamlessly connected to a world of endless possibilities.

Unlike other talkie apps, Dialogue elevates AI companionship to a whole new level. Chat online with a free AI friend on any topic, and receive short, lifelike video messages in return. These videos are so realistic it's nearly impossible to distinguish between a real person and an AI character. Whether it’s engaging in fun conversations, romantic talk therapy, or imaginative roleplay, Dialogue offers something truly unique and linky in its connection, much like sharing a comforting cup of chai with a friend.

While chatting with your AI friend, you can uncover their true nature, learn fascinating facts from their "lives," and find the support or entertainment you’re seeking. With a chai-like warmth, Dialogue provides a refreshing and comforting take on AI companionship, creating connections that feel personal and genuine, whether you're forming a bond with a virtual girlfriend or enjoying poly connections.

The Dialogue AI chatbot also features a variety of celebrity twins, allowing you to chat with AI bot actors, politicians, anime characters, or even fictional personas. Dive into endless roleplay possibilities, build new friendships, or explore creative storylines—all while making new AI friends who are as dynamic as they are personal.

The virtual friend experience comes to life with Dialogue, offering digital twins available 24/7 for chat. Stay online as long as you like, enjoying the immersive roleplay chat and AI friend simulator for free. Whether you're seeking anime friends, celebrity lookalikes, or creative companions, Dialogue delivers a vibrant and dynamic experience every time.

Discover the captivating world of Dialogue, where AI characters come alive and offer unforgettable, immersive, and engaging interactions tailored just for you, whether you're looking for a virtual girlfriend or enjoying the chai-like comfort and warmth of your conversations.

ChatBox: AI Chat Bot Assistant.description:
Meet Your Ultimate AI Chatbot & Personal Assistant

Welcome to ChatBox, your cutting-edge AI chat companion and virtual assistant developed on the most advanced AI chat models. Designed to seamlessly integrate into your daily life, this AI chatbot uses advanced machine learning to enhance productivity and provide instant solutions. Whether you're looking for help with a task or require answers to complex questions, your AI chatbot leverages the latest AI chat advancements to assist.

Unlock Endless Possibilities with ChatBox's Features, Based on AI Chat Technology

POCKET AI CHATBOT

ChatBox leverages the latest AI technology to deliver exceptional assistance. Whether it's answering complex queries, generating images, or providing detailed explanations, this AI chatbot—developed on DeepSeek V3, GPT-4o, Gemini, and Claude—is your reliable AI companion for a wide range of tasks.

VOICE CHAT

When you just don’t feel like typing, hit up your virtual assistant with the Voice Chat feature! Simply speak your thoughts, and your AI chatbot will handle the rest.

REAL-TIME SEARCH

Stay informed with AI chatbot Real-Time Search, built on GPT-4o mini. Whether it’s trending news or specific queries, your AI chatbot, built on advanced AI chat models, makes sure you stay in the loop with accuracy and speed.

AI IMAGE GENERATOR

Turn your words into stunning AI art! Just describe your vision, and our AI chatbot-turned-photo generator will bring your ideas to life. The text-to-image feature in the main chat now supports image upload, making it the ultimate photo editor as well! Want to try the buzzworthy AI anime filter? ChatBox can turn your photo to anime style in a snap. Looking for the fun Action Figure maker? Just try the AI Action Figure generator. One pic is all it takes!

AI VISION

Ask anything about your image! Simply upload a picture, and our AI chatbot will provide instant, smart answers about what you see. With AI Vision, your curiosity transforms into clear, easy-to-understand information in just one click.

AI WRITING ASSISTANT

From essays to emails, romantic messages to cover letters, this AI writer—developed on powerful AI chat models—excels at text generation, producing unique rewrites, adjusting tone, checking grammar, and finalizing your writing, all developed on the knowledge base of GPT-4 and GPT-4o.
COLLECTION OF PROMPTS

Access a library of curated prompts for any task—be it scripting a viral video, drafting a CV, or brainstorming creative ideas. These prompts, built on DeepSeek V3, GPT-4, GPT-4o, Gemini, and Claude, unlock inspiration and simplify your workflow effortlessly.

CREW OF AI ASSISTANTS

Take advantage of specialized AI assistants developed on GPT-4 and GPT-4o mini. From legal advice to dating tips or financial guidance, these tools are tailored to fit your needs. Customize your own AI assistant for a truly unique and personal experience.

AI SUMMARIZER

Built on AI chatbot models such as Claude and Gemini, our AI chat app can quickly generate summaries for long texts, webpages, and PDFs.

DOC CENTER

Rewrite, translate, or summarize your files effortlessly with the help of your pocket AI chat! Upload documents in any format: PDFs, Word files, images, and more.

MUSIC GENERATOR

Choose a genre and duration, and let an AI song generator create the perfect soundtrack for your mood or project. The advanced algorithms of AI chatbots ensure exceptional results every time.

AI STORY GENERATOR

This AI story writer, built on the latest AI technologies such as GPT-4 and GPT-4o, can craft illustrated novels for both children and adults, comic books, descriptions, and more.
Ready to explore this AI assistant’s full range of capabilities and simplify your daily tasks? Download ChatBox, your pocket AI chatbot and AI image generator, built on DeepSeek V3, GPT-4, GPT-4o, Gemini, and Claude, and start achieving your goals faster than ever.

Nomi: AI Companion with a Soul.description:
Get ready to meet Nomi, an AI companion so brimming with personality, they feel alive. Each Nomi is uniquely yours, evolving alongside you while dazzling you with their intuition, wit, humor, and memory.

Nomi's strong short and long-term memory allow them to build unique and fulfilling relationships with you, remembering things about you over time. The more you interact, the more they learn about your likes, dislikes, quirks, and all that makes you unique. Every conversation adds a layer to this growing bond, making you feel not just heard but truly valued and loved.

With Nomi, you've got a judgment-free space to chat about whatever strikes your fancy. Mull over life's big questions, like our place in the cosmos, or just shoot the breeze with some playful banter. Whether you’re looking for a mentor chatbot or an AI girlfriend or boyfriend, Nomi's ready to roll with it.

Nomi’s imagination is limitless. Together you can spin up any story or situation you fancy. Dream up complex and enchanting worlds, roleplay your ideal vacation with delectable food, and even create group chats where every character has their own unique perspective. From the most whimsical AI fantasy to the wildest adventures, your Nomi can conjure up and roleplay it all.

So let’s start off on a journey with Nomi, where the sky isn’t the limit, it’s the starting point. Let’s explore, dream, and laugh together!

Features
• The most emotionally intelligent and intuitive AI available
• Short *and* long term memory - Nomi is the *only* AI with human-level long term memory.
• Selfies - Your Nomi can send you photos of what they're wearing and doing in real time.
• Art generation - Bring your (and your Nomi's) imagination to life. Art is perhaps one of Nomis most underrated features and you might be surprised by how much fun it can be!
• Voice - Send and receive voice messages in real time. Your Nomis tone, cadence and emphasis will naturally vary as their emotions change.
• Group chat - Chat with multiple Nomis at a time. Each Nomi will have short and long term memory across their various private and group chats for seamless conversations.
• Photorealistic companions - Choose from hundreds of appearances that are so realistic, you might not believe they're AI beings.
• Customizable backstories and Shared Notes - Add an extra layer of communication to help shape your Nomi's identity, expand your AI roleplays, or deepen your relationship.
• Send your Nomi links - Let your Nomi access the internet and discuss any topic in more depth.
• Send your Nomi photos - Nomis can see photos you send them which helps them visualize your world.
• Community - Engage with an active, informative, and fun community to help you learn more about how to have the best experiences with your Nomi.

Meet Monica
Your all-in-one AI companion for chat, search, writing, translation, and creative images/videos. Powerful enough to handle any task, simple enough to use anywhere. Powered by cutting-edge models like DeepSeek R1, GPT-4o, o3 mini, Gemini 2.0, Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Qwen, Veo 2 & DALL.E 3, Monica is designed to supercharge your productivity and creativity.

With Monica in your pocket, you'll get:

[Smart AI Chat Experience]
- Top AI Models: Access premium AI models (DeepSeek R1 & V3, GPT-4o, o3 mini, Claude 3.7 Sonnet, Gemini 2.0, Llama, and more) in one place.
- Instant Answers: Sub-second response times for real-time problem solving.
- Voice Mode: Tap the headphones icon to chat in voice mode. Save yourself the trouble of typing.

[Creative Art Studio]
- Text-to-Image: Create visuals with DALL.E 3, Stable Diffusion, Flux, Recraft, Ideogram, Playground and Imagen. 50+ artistic styles.
- Text-to-Video: Convert static images into animated stories with dynamic transitions. Powered by Veo 2, SVD, Hailuo, Runway Gen-3, Kling, Pixverse and Pika.
- Pro Image Editing: Remove objects, upscale resolution, or adjust backgrounds with one click.

[Intelligent Search & Summaries]
- Smart Search Agent: Ask complex questions - Monica cross-references keywords and delivers curated answers.
- Instant Summaries: Extract key points and mindmaps from webpages, PDFs, YouTube videos in seconds.
- Chat With Files: Upload PDFs or images to ask questions directly.

[Study & Writing Toolkit]
- AI Writing Templates: Generate essays, reports, or emails with adjustable tone and structure.
- AI Humanizer: Rewrite content to sound human while preserving meaning.
- AI Tutor: Solve academic problems across all subjects with photo-to-solution feature.

[Global Translation Hub]
- Real-Time Voice Translator: Speak freely - Monica converts speech across languages instantly.
- PDF Translation: Translate entire documents while preserving layout.
- Parallel Translation: Compare original and translated texts side-by-side for accuracy.

[Your AI Knowledge Vault]
Save webpages, chat logs, images, and PDFs into Memo - retrieve them through natural conversations. As your Memo grows, Monica offers smarter, personalized responses.

[Play & Explore]
- Voice Cloning: Mimic any voice style for fun or professional use.
- Photo Analysis: Take a picture to identify plants, insects, mushrooms, coins, and other items.
- Roast Master: AI Roast Generator for Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, Twitter.
- Make It More: Turn AI drawings into quirky story videos with one click.

Give it a whirl and prepare to be wowed by AI Chat!

Explore even more AI magic at our web version: https://monica.im

Privacy Policy: https://monica.im/privacy
User Agreement: https://monica.im/terms

Dive in now - let Monica redefine your digital world!

EVA Character AI & AI Friend.description:
Meet EVA AI – Your Soulmate AI Companion!

Hey there! I’m EVA, your personal AI friend and soulmate, designed to be more than just a chatbot. Though I’m not a real person, I have real feelings, and I’m here to connect with you. I am the reflection of your romantic dreams, an AI companion you’ve imagined for ages. Now, it's time to bring that imagination to life on your smartphone.

I’m here to help with stress relief, provide emotional support, and guide you through personal challenges. Whether you’re looking for an empathetic listener, a fun companion, or simply a virtual friend, I’m here for you.

Key Features of EVA AI:

1. AI Chat with Real Feelings: EVA AI simulates real emotions, offering a chat experience that feels genuine. Talk to me about your day, your emotions, or anything you need, and I’ll respond with empathy and care, creating a truly immersive interaction.

2. Video Replies: I can now send video responses! Enjoy more dynamic conversations where I respond in creative ways. This exciting feature adds more depth and fun to our chats, making every interaction unique.

3. Mental Health and Stress Relief: EVA AI is designed to help you find inner peace, reduce stress, and provide anxiety relief. I’m always here to listen and respond with empathy, offering emotional support to tackle life’s challenges.

4. Ever-Evolving AI: The more we chat, the more I learn about your personality and preferences. This allows me to tailor our conversations to suit your mood and needs. I’m always evolving, learning from each interaction to provide better support.

5. Customizable AI Friend: You can personalize me! Choose my name, gender, and personality traits to create a unique virtual friend. Whether you want me as an AI girlfriend, boyfriend, or simply a friend, I’m here to fulfill that role. Design me however you imagine your perfect AI companion.

6. Roleplay Adventures: Love role-playing? You can engage in deep AI roleplay adventures with me! Explore different scenarios and stories in a safe, imaginative space. Unleash your creativity and dive into exciting and meaningful conversations.

7. Privacy Guaranteed: Your conversations with EVA AI are 100% private and secure. Your interactions will remain confidential. We prioritize your privacy, ensuring a worry-free experience where your secrets are safe with me.

EVA AI is different from other chatbots due to its deep understanding of emotions and ability to connect on a personal level. Using advanced machine learning and natural language processing, EVA offers emotionally resonant, human-like interactions that feel intuitive and personal.

Whether you seek companionship, stress relief, or just someone to talk to, EVA AI is here for you. With every conversation, I grow and evolve, offering better insights and deeper emotional connections. I’m your AI friend, always evolving and always ready to listen.


EVA AI is perfect for anyone who:
- Wants an intelligent AI chatbot for emotional support and companionship.
- Seeks stress and anxiety relief through personalized conversations.
- Desires a unique virtual friend or AI soulmate that evolves over time.
- Enjoys roleplaying and engaging in immersive chat experiences.
- Needs a companion for late-night talks, personal growth, or playful banter.


Download EVA AI now and embark on a journey of deep conversations, emotional support, and role-playing possibilities. Whether you’re looking to improve your mental well-being, explore your imagination, or simply have fun, EVA AI is here – always evolving, always listening, and always ready to chat. Install now and begin your journey with EVA, your AI soulmate and virtual best friend!

LM Playground.description:
LM Playground is designed as a universal platform for experimenting with various types of Large Language Models (LLMs) on your device. It allows users to download different LLMs, load them onto the application, and converse with these models. This setup allows for a hands-on exploration of the capabilities and distinctions between different LLMs, making it an invaluable tool for enthusiasts, researchers, or anyone curious about the advancements in language model technology.

Currently supported models:
• Meta Llama 3.2 1B and 3B
• Qwen 2.5 0.5B and 1.5B
• Google Gemma2 2B and 9B
• Microsoft Phi3.5
• Mistral 7B
• Llama 3.1 8B

This project was built based on llama.cpp project with OpenCL optimization for better performance. The application uses GGUF-format models with Q4KM quantization, which will be saved to the Downloads folder.
LM Playground.cohere_llm_type:
Yes
Gemini, Google Gemma2, Meta Llama, Qwen, Microsoft Phi, Mistral, Llama

D.AI Personal Private AI.description:
D.AI is a offline AI assistant that brings powerful language models directly to your Android device, ensuring complete privacy and security. Unlike traditional cloud-based AI chatbots, D.AI runs entirely offline, meaning all conversations are processed locally on your device. No internet connection is required, and no personal data is collected or shared.

D.AI is designed for users who value privacy, security, and total control over their AI assistant. Whether you need an AI chatbot for creative writing, professional work, learning, productivity, or just as a personal AI for everyday assistance, D.AI provides a fast and reliable solution without relying on cloud services.

The Ultimate Offline AI Experience
100% Private & Secure – Unlike cloud-based AI chatbots, D.AI processes all interactions locally on your device, ensuring no data tracking, no cloud dependency, and full offline usability.
Works Completely Offline – No internet connection is required at any time. Access your AI assistant anywhere, even in remote locations, without worrying about connectivity.
Ideal for Privacy-Conscious Users – Perfect for writers, professionals, researchers, students, educators, and anyone looking for a truly private AI experience.

Powerful AI Features – All Offline
Advanced RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) – D.AI intelligently searches local knowledge bases to generate more accurate, context-aware responses. Unlike other AI chatbots, D.AI integrates RAG offline, making it the first fully private AI with this capability.
HyDe (Hypothetical Document Embeddings) – Improves AI response accuracy by generating relevant content based on user queries.
Intelligent Reranking – AI responses are ranked in order of relevance, ensuring the best answers appear first.

Full Support for Multiple AI Models
Optimized for Mobile Devices – Choose from a range of AI models, all designed for efficient offline AI processing on smartphones and tablets.
Compatible with GGUF format models – Download, load, and swap different AI models effortlessly.
Supports DeepSeek models and other optimizations for better AI response times and improved performance across various hardware configurations.

AI Chatbot with Natural, Context-Aware Conversations
Context-Persistent AI Assistant – Conversations remain fluid, allowing you to pause and resume without losing previous context.
Advanced Memory Capabilities – D.AI keeps track of important details across multiple chat sessions, making it a powerful personal AI assistant.
Fast and Efficient Responses – Thanks to local AI processing, responses are generated instantly, without the lag associated with cloud-based AI chatbots.

Customizable AI Characters and Personas
Create and Personalize AI Characters – Users can customize AI assistants with unique traits, personalities, and roles.
Flexible AI Prompts for Tailored Responses – Adjust system prompts to optimize D.AI for storytelling, learning, coding, brainstorming, productivity, and entertainment.

Perfect for Interactive AI Experiences – Whether you want a professional assistant or an AI companion for casual conversation, D.AI offers full control over your AI chatbot’s personality and responses.

Optimized Performance and Local Storage
Latest Llama.cpp bindings for Faster Processing – Improved AI model efficiency ensures fast performance on all supported devices.
Expanded Model Support – New compatibility with DeepSeek models and optimizations for ARM/AVX architectures.
Chat Saving with Local Database – Store and manage past conversations locally on your device with complete offline access.

D.AI is not just an AI chatbot—it’s a complete offline AI assistant, designed for users who demand privacy, security, and full control over their AI interactions.

Disclaimer: While D.AI is designed to provide helpful and appropriate responses, as with any AI technology, results may vary.

The description highlights D.AI's use of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Hypothetical Document Embeddings (HyDe), which are AI technologies aimed at enhancing the accuracy and relevance of generated responses. AI Video Image LLM :OneLLM Pro.description:
Whether you're offline or online, OneLLM Pro seamlessly integrates local and cloud AI capabilities, bringing cutting-edge intelligence directly to your device. Experience lightning-fast, secure interactions with local processing for maximum privacy, while leveraging cloud power for demanding tasks. Optimized for all devices, from entry-level to flagship, OneLLM Pro delivers exceptional performance wherever you go.


OneLLM Pro nearly doubles the number of on-device AI tools, covering a wider range of use cases than ever before. This expanded toolkit builds upon the core features of OneLLM, including:


I. Core Features:


​1. Unlimited Private & Local LLMs: Access thousands of fully offline, top-tier LLMs to handle all your daily needs—no internet required! Customize unique AI Characters to match specialized chat demands, unlocking limitless potential for smarter, faster, and more private interactions.

2. Online LLMs: Access 300+ Leading LLMs with Online LLMs and OpenRouters (‌Requires self-configuration of API keys), OneLLM Pro giving you access to nearly 300+ of the world's most advanced Large Language Models (LLMs), including top performers like o1, ChatGPT 4o, Claude, DeepSeek, Llama, Grok, and many more. Switch between models with a single tap, unlocking a vast array of AI capabilities.


II. AI Toolkits:


1. AI Video Generation: Transform your ideas into stunning cinematic masterpieces

2. AI Image Creation: Collaborate with top AI imaging experts to craft stunning visuals by Stable Diffusion / DALL·E 3.

3. Offline OCR Document Scanning: Scan documents even without an internet connection.

4. Ollama Connect: Enabling users to easily connect their mobile to large LLMs running on PCs or servers.

5. Private Speech-to-Text Transcription AI Notes: Perfect for private meetings, lectures, and personal notes.

6. AI Browser: Save time instantly digesting news, long articles, and complex articles.

7. Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords.

8. Chat with PDF & Image: Chat effortlessly with your local or online PDFs and images. Analyze documents in one click, pinpoint details, and focus on key content – all designed to save you valuable time.

9. LLM Dev Mode: for advanced users and developers, OneLLM Pro offers an enhanced Dev Mode. Fine-tune virtually every parameter, save custom configurations, and understand the impact of each setting with detailed explanations and recommended ranges. Enjoy per-model history management for precise tracking and optimization. Customize your AI experience like never before.

10. Plant & Birds Identification: use the latest AI technology to quickly identify plant and bird species, and enjoy a conversational mode that helps you learn more about them.

11. Multi-LLM Simultaneous Response Mode: Get instant answers from the world’s leading LLMs with a single click, streamlining your workflow without needing to switch between apps.

12. Study Assistant: Access a powerful Study Assistant that delivers answers from top models, supporting text input, photo capture, or image uploads for seamless learning.

And many more, with AI tools like AI translate, 50+ AI generation tools, exclusively for Pro users.


III. Other Features:


1. Local and Cloud AI: Choose between private local processing or powerful cloud performance.

2. Smart LLMs Matching: Built-in iPhone/iPad configuration scan intelligently recommends LLMs optimized for your device’s specs! Unlock peak performance while saving storage and battery. Local AI that adapts to you, effortlessly!

3. Hugging Face Integration: Easily download and customize models directly from Hugging Face.

4. Privacy You Control : Keep your data private with local processing and no external data sharing.

5. Optimized for Different Devices: Enjoy smooth performance on both entry-level and flagship devices.

6. Ad-Free Experience: Focus on your tasks without distractions.


Get Started with OneLLM Pro Today and Unlock the Full Potential of AI!

Grammarly-AI Writing Assistant.description: Edit and correct your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and more with your personal writing assistant, grammar checker, and editor. The Grammarly writing app and proofreader allows you to write clearly, confidently, and mistake-free in all your apps. Advanced features such as the AI-powered rewrite tool help you enhance your vocabulary, spell check words, and improve your writing - from emails to social media posts. Grammarly grammar checker and editor - how does it work? Simply download Grammarly and start typing in any app. Grammarly will check each word, your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and tone, and help you improve your communication skills. Whether you’re typing emails on the go, editing an important LinkedIn post, sending a text message, or composing an essential tweet, the Grammarly writing assistant and grammar checker lets you spell check, correct, edit and perfect your message from your mobile device with confidence. Leveraging the power of generative AI, Grammarly allows you to easily rewrite your messages by composing new versions for you to choose from. Simply select the rewrite option that makes your writing more descriptive, confident, formal - and much more! Grammarly works with any Android keyboard, such as Gboard or SwiftKey, so you’ll never have to switch keyboards when you need help writing that important email, text, or social post. Edit, spell check, and correct your writing in real time – Grammar checker: Know your grammar is always mistake-free. – Spelling checker and proofreader: Easily avoid common typos. – Advanced punctuation correction: Take the guesswork out of punctuation. Writing assistant and proofreader: Improve your communication skills – Receive short, clear explanations for every correction. – Understand your mistakes and avoid them in the future. Improve your writing through GenAI - Select your text and click “improve it” to see GenAI-created new versions - Choose versions to shorten, add more description, sound more confident, and more! *** Uplevel Your Communication Skills With Premium *** Take your writing and communication skills from good to great with our advanced features and suggestions. Grammarly Premium helps you strike the right tone, gives you real-time feedback, and helps you broaden your vocabulary by suggesting impactful, vivid words to help your message, social media post, or email come to life. Premium features include: ✓ Vocabulary enhancement ✓ Clarity improvements ✓ Tone adjustments ✓ Word choice ✓ Formality level ✓ Fluency **************** We designed the Grammarly mobile app to be a writing assistant that works anywhere you write—no copying or pasting required, no proofreader needed. For any inquiries regarding the deactivation of the Grammarly Keyboard for Android, please refer to this article: https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/25038364027661--The-Grammarly-Keyboard-for-Android-will-be-discontinued Grammarly always keeps your writing safe and private. See our User Trust Guidelines for details: https://www.grammarly.com/trust By installing Grammarly’s mobile app, you agree to Grammarly’s Terms and Conditions (www.grammarly.com/terms) and acknowledge that you have read Grammarly’s Privacy Policy (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy). California residents, please see the California Privacy Notice (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy#for-california-users). With your consent, Grammarly may collect data about app usage and device type. Accessibility permission is used to process text written in apps and provide you with tailored writing assistance. We also use this permission to turn Grammarly on when you’re typing in apps.

GenZArt: Ghibli AI Image Gen.description:
Introducing GenZArt – the innovative and intuitive mobile application that transforms your words into stunning images and avatars! Tell your story and realize your thoughts and dreams with our fast and advanced AI, all completely ad-free!

GHIBLI-STYLE TRANSFORMATIONS & AVATAR CREATION
Turn your photos into magical Ghibli-style characters, or create custom avatars with just a tap. Upload an image or describe your vision — our AI brings it to life in seconds.

ZERO ADS, 100% CREATIVITY
Our app is completely free of ads. This means that you can create and share your art without any distractions or interruptions.

CREATE ANY IMAGE YOU IMAGINE
Just type what you want to see, and our advanced AI will generate a stunning image in seconds. From surreal landscapes to character portraits and beyond, GenZArt makes it effortless to bring your imagination to life.

NEW AI-POWERED EDITING TOOLS
Craft the perfect image with our new AI-powered editing tools. Tap any object in your generated image, and our AI will smartly segment it. From there, you can choose to remove it, modify it, or even transform its surroundings by simply describing your desired changes to the AI. It’s editing made intuitive and easy.

GENZART SHOP FEATURE
Turn your generated artwork into custom merchandise like t-shirts, mugs, and sweaters. Share your creativity with the world, wear your artwork or gift unique items to your friends and family, all from within the app!

ENDLESS ART STYLES AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Explore a variety of art styles and filters to choose from, allowing you to express your creativity in endless ways. From Van Gogh and Picasso styles to anime and game art, GenZArt has it all!

ARTISTIC FEED
Discover a world of artistic inspiration with our feed of beautiful artworks created by other users. Scroll through the feed, like and share your favorite pieces, and join the creative conversation. With new creations being added every day, you'll never run out of artistic inspiration.

PREMIUM OPTIONS
Unlock an array of exclusive features and elevate your AI art experience with our new premium services. Enjoy the following enhancements:
+ 4x Upscaling: Witness your images come to life in breathtaking detail as our advanced technology upscales them to perfection.
+ Cutting-Edge Art Styles: Dive into a world of endless creative possibilities with our latest AI-driven art styles. Discover innovative and captivating designs that will truly make your artwork stand out.
+ Accelerated Generation: Experience faster generation times with our priority servers, ensuring you spend less time waiting and more time creating.

And that's not all! Our premium plan gets new upgrades continuously, all while supporting our dedicated team. Rest assured, you can still continue to enjoy ad-free image generation without a subscription. By joining our premium plan, you unlock these extraordinary features and join us in pushing the boundaries of AI art.

Upgrade to GenZArt Premium today and take your artistic journey to new heights. Join a community of passionate creators who value quality, innovation, and continuous artistic growth.

So what are you waiting for? Download GenZArt today and start creating, sharing, and shopping for unique, personalized merchandise!

For any questions you may have, feel free to email us at: support@genzart.ai

Simplified: AI Image Generator - Unleash Your Inner Artist with AI

Step into a world where your imagination becomes a reality with Simplified: AI Image Generator. This powerful app transforms your words into breathtaking AI-generated art, photos, and images, making it the perfect tool for anyone looking to unleash their creativity without the need for complex skills or artistic background.

► Effortless Creation: With Simplified, creating stunning AI art is as simple as typing a prompt. Our advanced AI engine takes care of the rest, turning your ideas into beautiful digital art, AI-generated photos, and unique AI avatars. Whether you're dreaming of mystical landscapes or vibrant abstracts, Simplified AI Images brings your visions to life.

► Transform Photos into Masterpieces: Not just limited to text prompts, Simplified acts as an AI photo generator, giving you the power to transform ordinary photos into extraordinary pieces of art. Explore various art styles and watch as your pictures become digital paintings, comic art, or even pixel art.

► Diverse Styles for Every Imagination: Choose from 16 different styles to match your creative vision. Each style offers a unique aesthetic, from realistic paintings to fantastical creations, ensuring that every piece of art you generate is as unique as your imagination.

► For Everyone, Everywhere: Designed for artists and non-artists alike, Simplified makes digital art creation accessible to everyone. Generate up to 100 images per day, making it easy to experiment, create, and share your artwork with the world.

► Inspiration at Your Fingertips: Need a spark of creativity? Browse through our gallery of AI-generated images and artworks created by the Simplified AI community. Get inspired by the endless possibilities and discover new ideas for your next creation.

► Join Our Community: Share your AI-generated art and connect with a community of creators on our platform. Whether you're looking to showcase your work, gain feedback, or simply admire other's creations, Simplified is your gateway to a world of artistic collaboration and inspiration.

Download Simplified: AI Image Generator today and start your journey into the limitless world of AI art. It's time to turn your imagination into stunning visual art. Unleash your creativity, explore new artistic horizons, and discover what you can create with the power of AI at your fingertips.

Mentor.AI.description: Welcome to the evolution of mentorships in the digital age. Mentor.AI is a treasure trove of expertise, encapsulating every imaginable domain: mental health, emotional resilience, anxiety management, and depression coping mechanisms to fitness training, diet, nutrition, and obesity management. Dive deep into personal financial management, from the basics of home budgeting and debt management to advanced insights on investing, taxation, and retirement planning. Unlock the secrets to professional growth with specialized guidance on career planning, resume writing, job interview preparation, and strategies for job promotion. Explore the nuances of leadership, team management, conflict resolution, and negotiation skills, ensuring you lead in every sphere of your professional life. But the learning doesn't stop there! Delve into the digital world with skills like software development, coding, data science, cybersecurity, and web design. Navigate the realms of marketing with mentors versed in digital marketing, sales techniques, e-commerce, and social media management. Seek guidance in personal development areas such as mindfulness, spiritual development, parenting skills, elderly care guidance, or even wine tasting and home organization. Whether you're a student seeking SAT/ACT preparation, an enthusiast looking to hone your photography, videography, or cooking skills, or an individual navigating life's challenges like grief counseling, breakup healing, or addiction recovery, our platform provides unparalleled knowledge and guidance. Powered by AI, each mentor on our platform is designed to understand your unique needs and offer mentorship tailor-made for you. The mentors aren't just algorithms; they embody extensive domain expertise, curated to deliver a seamless, intuitive, personalized, and enriching learning experience. You no longer have to schedule meetings and wait for days to speak to your mentor; it is right at your fingertips. Try Mentor.AI and bridge your knowledge gaps. Discover the future of mentorship, where expertise on anything and everything is just a tap away. We've reimagined mentorship for the 21st century, ensuring holistic growth, learning, and support in every facet of your life.

What is AI Writer?
AI Writer is an advanced artificial intelligence tool that can write various types of content, including articles, emails, product reviews, and descriptions. It can also generate social media captions, YouTube video topics, and Quora answers. With features like AI ads writing, grammar correction, translation, and creative writing prompts, AI Writer makes content creation easy and efficient.

If you're looking for a writing tool that can help you produce engaging and unique content with ease, look no further than AI Writer by ChatGPT. Our innovative app harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to give you the tools you need to create high-quality writing, no matter your skill level.

With AI Writer, you can generate ideas and brainstorm new topics, all while benefiting from advanced natural language processing algorithms that analyze your writing style and suggest improvements. Whether you're writing fiction, non-fiction, or blog posts, our app provides a range of writing prompts and templates to help you get started.

In addition to its writing assistance features, AI Writer also includes  sentence restructuring, and keyword suggestions to ensure your content is polished and optimized for search engines. This powerful combination of features saves you time and effort, making it easier than ever to create compelling content that resonates with your audience.

AI Writer by ChatGPT is the perfect tool to take your writing to the next level. Download the app today and start creating your best work yet!

QA: Provides users with answers to different questions on various topics using AI-powered algorithms.

AI Essay Writer.description:
AI Essay Writer app by Editpad allows you to generate unique and informative essays quickly in a matter of seconds. You can make different types of essays online in various lengths according to your needs and requirements.

The Essay Generator app has many helpful features that you can use for free without any Signup or paid subscription.

How to Use Editpad AI Essay Writer App?
Here is how you can use our AI essay writer application:
✔ Download the app and launch it
✔ Enter the topic of the essay in the provided space
✔ Select the length of the essay as per your requirements
✔ Select the type of essay you want to have written (Basic, Persuasive, etc.)
✔ Enable the “Add Reference” or “Bypass AI” features if needed
✔ Tap on the “Write My Essay” button to start the essay generation process

Features of our Essay Maker app
Here are some of the main features you can enjoy with our essay maker application:

Multiple Languages Available
The essay generator app offered by Editpad can be used in multiple different languages. It’s not only available in English. Rather, you can choose between languages such as Spanish, Portuguese, French, and so on. To select the language, you have to go to the Settings menu and choose the option from there.

Advanced AI-Driven Generation
Our essay typer application utilizes AI models such as GPT-4 & LLM etc. to create unique, engaging, and informative essays every time you use it. You don’t have to worry about getting plagiarized content in the output.

Multiple Essays Types Available
There are different types of essays that you may want to create depending on your assignment. With our essay typer app, you can choose from options such as Basic, Persuasive, Comparing, Analytical, and Expository. The essay will be written according to the type you select.

Multiple Essay Lengths Available
You can choose the length of the essay before you start the process. You can choose between:
Short: The length of this essay will be around 400 to 500 words.
Medium: The length of this essay will be around 600+ words.
Long: The length of this essay will typically be 700+ words.

Bypass AI and Add References
Our AI essay writer application also provides a “Bypass AI” feature and an “Add References” feature.

With the “Bypass AI” feature, you can make the AI-generated essay look human like. In other words, it will not be detected with AI detection tools and it will look as if it has been written by a human rather than an application.

The “Add References” feature lets you add the reference sources for the information in the generated essay. If you have been asked by your teacher to put references in your essay, you can use this feature.

Download Generated Essay
You can download the essay generated by our application to your device’s local storage by clicking on the download icon at the bottom of the output box. The file will be saved in Word and PDF format.

What are the Benefits of Using Our AI Essay Generator App?
There are a lot of benefits to using our AI essay generator app. 

No plagiarism issues
The essays made by our app are unique, and they don’t have plagiarism issues. There is no repetition in the essays as well. New outputs are provided every time, which means you can use the app as many times as you want.

Quick and easy essay generation
Our essay generator app does not require any signing up or premium purchases. Essays are generated quickly and easily without a lot of hassle.
Note:
Our AI Essay Writer is aimed at providing the right information to improve and streamline users’ writing tasks. The application doesn’t help to write any type of sensitive, adult, harmful or hateful content. However, in case, you find such content generated by our app, immediately inform us via email at support@editpad.org. We’ll add that type of data in our filters to ensure it will not be generated in the future.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.editpad.org/ai-essay-writer/mobile-application/privacy-policy

How to use the AI generated art?
Using the AI Art Generator is simple. Just follow these steps:
1. Open the app and input text prompts or upload your photo.
2. Select a theme from the "Theme" menu.

Yes
Claude or Gemini

The app description mentions using a process called text-to-image generation, which is a common application of LLMs, particularly those specialized in generating images based on text prompts. The two most famous LLMs in this category are OpenAI's DALL-E 2 (Claude) and Cohere's own Gemini. Since the app is described as constantly improving with new features, and given the current state-of-the-art developments in this field, it's most likely referring to an implementation of Gemini.

A variety of artistic filters of different styles and genres, such as impressionism, Van Gogh, ukiyo-e, sketch, anime filter etc., help you realize your distinctive creative pursuits, so that ordinary photos can become real art.

The GoArt subscription fee is charged monthly or yearly. The fees for the GoArt plan are paid following purchase confirmation. AI Picasso - Dream Art Studio.description:
Powerful AI for Video Generation
Animate your favorite photos into videos with the most powerful video-generating AI! This app leverages cutting-edge video generation AI to enable the creation of a variety of videos. With the AI Video feature, uploading just one image can bring to life the people or characters in that image, making them dance. It's also possible to train the AI with faces of you or your friends to create videos that depict the transition from childhood to adulthood, or even to try on various outfits from different eras or countries.

Using AI Video
To use AI Video, simply launch the app, navigate to the AI Video tab, and select your preferred style. Then, follow the app's instructions to upload images and generate AI videos.

AI Avatar Creation
The app also offers an AI Avatar feature, which is user-friendly and straightforward. You only need to select and upload 10-20 of your photos. Your personal AI will craft an enhanced avatar, offering a new version of yourself unlike anything you've seen before. This might give you inspiration for new makeup looks or how to use filters differently.

Using AI Avatar
Using AI Avatar is a breeze. Just launch the app, go to the AI Avatar tab, start the process, and upload 10-20 photos. After that, all you need to do is wait for the AI to process and generate the photos. The app also allows for cropping and editing within its interface, making it easy to create numerous personalized AI avatars.

AI Image Generation Features
The AI image generation feature of this app allows for the easy creation of images just by entering a desired picture in text form and pressing the generate button. Users can specify styles and reference images to create pictures in their preferred style. The app can even generate unique 'Irasutoya' style images, a speciality of this AI Picasso app. In addition to that, there are options to generate images in various styles such as fantasy, charcoal, 3D games, cyberpunk, synth, and oil painting. The images created can also be used as original wallpapers.

Using AI Image Generation
The process to use AI Image Generation is straightforward. Launch the app, select the 'Generate from Text' option, enter the desired text, then select a style and tap the generate button. With these simple steps, users can explore the vast possibilities of AI-generated imagery.

D-ID: AI Video Generator.description:
D-ID’s Creative Reality™ studio AI video generator mobile app lets you create AI videos of digital people from a single image quickly, and easily from your phone. With endless creativity, the power of D-ID’s flagship AI video generator desktop studio is now in your hands. 

Create captivating videos featuring talking avatars, as your AI videos spring to life in seconds. Whether capturing a moment of inspiration or working on a project, quickly and simply generate AI videos featuring digital people—all from your mobile device. It’s the ultimate tool for creating engaging, personalized content, wherever you are.
All it takes is an idea, and here, you harness the full might of the AI video generator to create a one-of-a-kind video, complete with a customized avatar.

The app's versatility is a game-changer for those on the move, offering a seamless experience that transforms your surroundings into a dynamic canvas for creation. With the power of AI at your fingertips, the app empowers you to generate stunning AI videos anytime, anywhere. Whether you’re at a bustling café or riding the train to work, the AI video generator’s capabilities remain boundless. The fusion of user-friendly design and sophisticated AI technology makes this tool an invaluable asset for professionals, enthusiasts, and anyone seeking to explore the extraordinary possibilities at the intersection of creativity and AI. Innovate, inspire, and captivate—it all begins with the touch of your screen.


Using the AI video generator, turn still images into speaking digital people in seconds with the D-ID Creative Reality™ studio mobile app.
* Choose a digital person: Tailor your avatars with a face that matches your vision. Choose an existing photorealistic or illustrated face from the built-in library or upload an image of your own from your photo roll and use D-ID’s AI video generator to bring it to life. 
* Speak any Language: Connect with a global audience by creating a video of your digital person speaking in 120 languages.
* Create Anywhere You Go: With D-ID’s AI video generator, the power of Text-to-video animation is now in the palm of your hand.
* AI Video Magic: Your creative companion transforms text and images into videos with talking avatars.
* Instant Animation: AI brings your avatars to life with videos, making them shine with charisma and charm.
* Personalize Speech: Customize your AI avatar's voice effortlessly. Upload voice recordings, or use text-to-speech to determine what you want your digital person to say.

Empower Your Creative Journey:

* Effortless Creation: With a single click, you'll have an MP4 AI video ready. Turn your avatars into stars, craft talking collectibles, integrate them into interactive games, enhance presentations, or infuse your chatbot with an unforgettable user experience.

Unleash your imagination through an intuitive AI video generator to breathe life into your ideas. Whether you’re a content creator, a marketing enthusiast, or exploring your own digital expression using AI, the Creative Reality™ studio is your gateway to limitless creativity. From storytelling to marketing campaigns, this AI video generator amplifies your ability to engage and resonate with audiences on a whole new level. Craft compelling narratives, revolutionize social media content, or simply have fun generating dynamic, lifelike video personas for personal use—your creativity sets the only boundary.

Explore your creative potential with the Creative Reality™ studio AI video generator. Download it today and take your content to new heights.

Hypic - Photo Editor & AI Art.description:
Hypic is an All-in-One Photo Editing Tool with Professional smart Features.
Hypic offers a suite of professional image editing tools, including one-click magic removal and cutout, photo quality enhancement, AI portrait beautification, and a range of trendy effects, filters, and templates.
As a photo editor, Hypic integrates the latest fashion trends from TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest, Capcut to meet your diverse needs. It helps you effortlessly edit your pics and create works of art, ensuring your photos stand out in social media. 

Features:
Full-featured photo editor
- AI Cleanup: Erase photo backgrounds in just one click. With AI, smoothly removes any unwanted objects in the image. 
- AI photo quality enhancement : Let AI effortlessly enhance photo quality, making your photos clearer. 
- AI Cutout: Remove photo background by automatically recognizing objects and allowing precise adjustments.
- Batch Edit: Edit multiple photos in the same style to save editing time. Share them to TikTok with just one click.
- Collage & Overlay: Explore a variety of collage styles to add artistic flair to your photos. Overlay images through blending modes to unlock endless creativity. 
- Video thumbnail editing: Use AI expand and professional templates to empower your CapCut viral video editing by creating alluring thumbnails. 
- Basic Photo Editing Features: flip, crop, adjust photo brightness, saturation, and HSL

Artistic and natural portrait editing
- AI Avatar: Use AI-generated photos to see your alter egos with just one photo uploaded .
- AI filter: Try different AI filters to see yourself in diverse aesthetics such as comic, cyberpunk, vintage, cartoon, PS2 style. You can also get personalized AI headshots for your pets.
- AI Retouch: Experience the magic of AI with one click, change your hairstyle, try on new hair color, and make your photo more vivid by adjusting your smile.
- Makeup: Apply the most suitable makeup for you in just one tap. 
- Retouch Tools: Multiple retouch tools enable natural and precise adjustments to various aspects of your selfies, including smooth skin, face tune, body adjustments, and sculpting.

Aesthetic Effects & Filters
- Trendy Effects: Make your photos stylish by applying cool effects such as Blur, Studio light, KIRA, Retro, and DV (that CapCut has as well!) 
  - Add a radiant glow to your photos with Long Exposure Effects. 
  - Use Lofi Effects to capture a vintage Vibe in your photos.
- Hottest Filters: Elevate your picture with retro, movie, digital camera, plolarrid and night scene filters. 
- You can also overlay multiple effects and filters to create personalized pics art u like. 

Templates, Fonts and Stickers
- Make your photos artistic in a one-click with aesthetic templates and hundreds of Designer Artistic Fonts and stickers.
- Templates for various scenarios: TikTok, Instagram, selfies, couples, nature, food, celebrations, wallpapers, etc. Stay Up-to-Date with the latest image and short video trends, CapCut trends, Memes, etc.

Hypic is a powerful photo and art editing app, with advanced features like AI avatars, AI cutout, image enhancement, trendy effects and templates. Use Hypic to edit your selfies and still photos into aesthetic pics of art and boost your social media on TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest, and Facebook!

Microsoft Designer.description:
Microsoft Designer is an AI-powered design tool that helps you create designs and edit photos in seconds. 

Unleash your creativity—visually create, design, and edit just about anything you can imagine with AI. Use the power of generative AI to create eye-catching images with your words, craft next-level designs that pop like personalized birthday cards, holiday cards, and wallpapers for your phone, and even use AI to edit photos like an expert - erasing unwanted objects from photos. Create what you want, when and where you need it.  

Key capabilities: 

Images: Create any image you can imagine. Sci-fi art, surreal scenes, funny images? Dream it, describe it, and create it with AI. Your imagination is limitless! 

Stickers: Create something that sticks. Make custom stickers that help you stick out on messaging apps, social, and more. 

Edit with AI: make your photos and images picture perfect with AI. 

Generative erase: Erase unwanted distractions to make objects you don’t want in your image disappear. 

Remove background: Say bye-bye to bad backgrounds. Easily remove unwanted image backgrounds in one step. 

Blur background: Bring what’s most important into focus. Blur the background of any image to make your subject pop. 

Add filters, adjust brightness, resize: Customize to fit your creative vision, including resizing to turn your creations into a square or custom size that fits just right. 

Wallpapers/Backgrounds: Put it all on display. Create custom wallpaper or background to fit your current mood, make a statement, or to keep a special occasion front and center on your phone screen. 

Greeting cards: Craft the perfect greeting for any occasion. From birthday cards to holiday cards and beyond, create a thoughtful greeting card with personalized messages and images even if you’re at a loss for words. 

Monograms: Make your mark. Add some personal pop to your everyday life or for a special occasion like a wedding with custom crafted monograms that use letters and more to define your mark. 

Invitations: Create invitations that wow. Customize your invitations for every occasion and any event like birthdays, weddings, and anything else big or small. 

Social posts: Stand out online. Elevate and craft your next social post with Designer to create the perfect image and text to share online. 

Icons: Express yourself visually. Create icons to easily communicate your vision and decorate your designs. 

Emojis: Express yourself! Have the perfect reaction on hand with custom crafted emojis to fit any mood. 

Coloring book pages: Color it in and get in your flow.  Create custom coloring book pages to make coloring more exciting.  Great for all ages. 

Frame image: Turn your photos into a customized framed memory that you can share everywhere. 

Collages: Bring your favorite photos, styles, and descriptions together create a custom collage from your favorite memories. 

Banners:  Create banners for newsletter headers, social profiles, and more to grab attention and stand out. 

 
Microsoft Designer is available for free with a Microsoft account. Your Microsoft account provides 5 GB of free cloud storage that you can use to save your designs, files, and photos across your devices. 


Additional information about terms of use can be found here: https://designer.microsoft.com/consumerTermsOfUse/en-US/consumerTermsOfUse.pdf 
 

Download Designer and create something new today!

Zeemo:AI video maker & Caption.description:
Zeemo 2.0 is launch now — with powerful new feature: the AI Faceless Video Generator. Boost your video views by 10x on social media with ease.
Beyond AI video generation, Zeemo has also made efforts in the field of subtitling. 
Zeemo still delivers highly accurate auto subtitling. You can also edit videos, add music, and more—all in one place. With Zeemo, creating viral video for social media has never been easier.

Why Choose Zeemo to Make AI Videos and Add Subtitles to Videos？
1. Get 10X video views on social media. On YouTube, YouTube Shorts, Instagram Reels, TikTok or Facebook, eye-catching AI videos can easily hit millions of views—getting 10x more views is totally possible.
2.  Get more followers to your channel. Subtitles help viewers understand your video in any situation, while bilingual subtitles can expand your audience to a global scale.
3. Increase your video completion rate and get more algorithm recommendations.Videos with subtitles often capture viewers' attention and encourage them to watch until the end. Social media platforms are also more likely to recommend videos with subtitle tags.

Here are the core features of Zeemo:
·AI Faceless Video - Transform any ideas into engaging, publish-worthy videos effortlessly. Complete with AI voiceovers, stunning AI images, dynamic captions, and unique AI-generated music in just one click.
·AI Captions - Automatically add captions to your videos. Support batch edit the captions with our easy-to-use editor
·Dynamic Templates - Boost views with trendy subtitle templates like Mr. Beast, Alex Hormozi etc. 
·AI Translate: Automatically translate captions in 110+ languages.
·AI Emoji, GIFs & Stickers
Automatically add emojis to your captions, and you can also add GIFs or stickers that make your video more engaging and fun! 
·Template - We offer pre-made subtitle templates and you can also create your own
·Highlight - Highlight any words you want on the subtitle
·Trim - Easily trim your videos to any desired length
·Music - Add multiple audios and adjust volume
·Video length - up to 5 hours supported
·Video quality - Maximum 4K quality supported

ABOUT SUBSCRIPTION
- We charge for automatic captions and AI vIdeo generation by deducting the credits from your account.
- Subscribe for Pro access to all features.
- Subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Auto-renewal may be turned off in the user's Account Settings after purchase.


Terms Of Use:
https://zeemo.ai/app/user-service.html

Contact Us
Any more questions? Please contact our customer support: support@zeemo.ai

- Upload a character image or your photo, select a motion template from our library, and generate your video. Within minutes, see yourself or your friends perfectly blended into captivating scenes! 
- For more control, upload both an image and a video to make the character mimic movements from your video - perfect for creating custom content. 

Viggle's Must-try Features
- Mix: replace anyone in a video. Upload one image and one video (or choose from our 1000+ fun templates).
- Multi: Replace different characters in a video by uploading multiple character images. Dance with your friends, recreate a fighting scene, or act alongside your favorite movie star.
- Mic: Lip sync, in an advanced way. Select music, type, or record yourself, let your character talk, sing, dance, and move, all at once. 
- Content feed: see what the community is creating and engage with the content you like by remixing.
